bioconda.name: bioconductor-acgh
bioconda.summary: Classes and functions for Array Comparative Genomic Hybridization data

biotools.summary: This tool includes functions for reading aCGH data from image analysis output files and clone information files or creating S3 objects for storing these data. It also incudes basic methods for accessing/replacing, subsetting, printing and plotting aCGH objects.

bioschemas.name: aCGH
bioschemas.summary: This tool includes functions for reading aCGH data from image analysis output files and clone information files or creating S3 objects for storing these data. It also incudes basic methods for accessing/replacing, subsetting, printing and plotting aCGH objects.
